summary: ASM syntax file for Motorola 68k processors
name: asmM68k.vim
description:
Highlighting for M68K assembly keywords, does not highlight opcodes without a size postfix in order to reduce bugs.
I\\&#039m sure there are better syntax files for the M68k, I just didn\\&#039t have any installed.
install_details: put in .../syntax dir, and set $ASMSYNTAX env var.
